biotools.summary: CaeNDR, the Caenorhabditis Natural Diversity Resource. CaeNDR enables quantitative genetics and genomics studies across three Caenorhabditis species. The platform hosts several databases that are continually updated by the addition of new strains, whole-genome sequence data and annotated variants. Additionally, CarNDR provides interative tools to explore natural variation and enable GWAS mappings.
